resources.string: Select the type of the obstacle
Please enter a description that includes the details of the obstacle, size and lenght
Before you start, we\'d like to give you a brief tutorial on the app. Just swipe right or tap the arrow to move to the next page.
The red color on the curbs means that there is no ramps or is not accessible.
The circles represent temporary obstacles in the sidewalks that can make difficult transit on them.
Night mode shows violet streets where the lighting is poor or the visibility is low
Click on the plus button to add a new obstacle and then locate the obstacle in the map.
Help others adding temporary obstacles you encounter, the rest is up to us!
